Literature.Title: Molecular structure, expression and antibacterial characterization of a novel antimicrobial peptide NK-lysin from the large yellow croaker Larimichthys crocea.
Literature.Author: Zhou QJ, Wang J, Mao Y, Liu M, Su YQ, Ke QZ, Chen J, Zheng WQ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=<1.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=<1.5µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=6-12µM),Escherichia coli(MBC=12-24µM),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=<1.5µM),Vibrio harveyi(MBC=<1.5µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=3-6µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MBC=3-6µM),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=>96µM),Aeromonas hydrophila(MBC=>96µM),hotobacterium damselae subsp. damselae(MIC=>96µM),hotobacterium damselae subsp. damselae(MBC=>96µM)
